subject: United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams defeated Marion Bartoli 6-3, 6-4 to open Sunday’s action and Venus Williams, three hours later, crushed the French Open finalist, Ana Ivanovic, 6-4, 6-2.
snippet: Serena Williams defeated Marion Bartoli 6-3, 6-4 to open Sunday’s action and Venus Williams, three hours later, crushed the French Open finalist, Ana Ivanovic, 6-4, 6-2.
